questions.question: What is the right to be informed?
options: The right to know about the quality and quantity of goods.
The right to know about the prices of goods.
The right to know about the origin of goods.

questions.question: Which of the following is a consumer right?
What does the right to seek redressal mean?
options: The right to complain against unfair trade practices.
The right to receive compensation for damages.
The right to be informed about products.
